languages.text: "Возможно... возможно, ты прав{mf||а}, Вольный Торговец. Праведный гнев не должен знать преград!"

traits.locale_text: "Возможно... возможны ты прав{mf||а}, Вольный Торговец. Праведный гнев не должен знать преград!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"
languages.original_text: "Возможно... возможно, ты прав{mf||а}, Вольный Торговец. Праведный гнев не должен знать преград!"

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"

languages.text: 「きっと…きっと御身が正しいでしょう、自由開拓者。正義の怒りに境界はない！」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"

traits.locale_text: 「きっと…きっと御身が正しいでしょう、自由開拓者。正義の怒りに境界はない！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “或许……或许你说得没错，行商浪人。正义的怒火必将烧尽一切邪恶！”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"

traits.locale_text: “或许……或许你说得没错，行商浪人。正义的怒火必将烧尽一切邪恶！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ma foi... vous avez peut-être raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La sainte colère ne saurait être réprimée ! »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi... vous avez peut-être raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La sainte colère ne saurait être réprimée ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez... Tal vez tenga razón, Comerciante Independiente. ¡La furia de la justicia no debe tener límite!».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez... Tal vez tenga razón, Comerciante Independiente. ¡La furia de la justicia no debe tener límite!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht ... vielleicht habt Ihr recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Rechtschaffener Zorn darf keine Grenzen kennen!"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ... vielleicht habt Ihr recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Rechtschaffener Zorn darf keine Grenzen kennen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Haklı... Haklı olabilirsin Hür Tacir. Haklı öfke dizginlenemez!"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... perhaps you are right, Rogue Trader. Righteous fury must know no bounds!"

traits.locale_text: "Haklı... Haklı olabilirsin Hür Tacir. Erdemli öfke dizginlenemez!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
